description.value:
A User that possesses this tome gains +10 to Barter and Charm tests made to those faithful to the Imperial Creed. It may also contain codewords that certain religious organisations use.

Requirements

A Tome that contains advice to missionaries on the best ways to influence others to the cause of faith.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
